header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food, friends, relationships, work, cooking, annoyance, disagreement.
header.activity: Evening catch-up with housemate after a busy weekend.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, inviting, anecdote telling, making arrangements, telling jokes

what did you get up to?
working how was yours?
manic
yeah?
ridiculous I left here at three on Friday to go to

got to spent the evening with
